option.name: description
option.value: Assembles the outputs of this project.

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles and tests this project.

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles and tests this project and all projects that depend on it.

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles and tests this project and all projects it depends on.

option.name: description
option.value: Deploys WAR to remote container.

option.name: description
option.value: Redeploys WAR to remote container.

option.name: description
option.value: Starts the container, deploys WAR to it and wait for the user to press CTRL + C to stop.

option.name: description
option.value: Starts the container, deploys WAR to it and then do other tasks (for example, execute tests).

option.name: description
option.value: Stops local container.

option.name: description
option.value: Undeploys WAR from remote container.

option.name: description
option.value: Runs all checks.

option.name: description
option.value: Run Checkstyle analysis for main classes

option.name: description
option.value: Run Checkstyle analysis for test classes

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles the main classes.

option.name: description
option.value: Deletes the build directory.

option.name: description
option.value: Compiles the main Groovy source.

option.name: description
option.value: Compiles the main/java source set.

option.name: description
option.value: Compiles the test Groovy source.

option.name: description
option.value: Compiles the test/java source set.

option.name: description
option.value: Populates local H2 database with data from Demo developmental tables (user data)

option.name: description
option.value: Generates Groovydoc API documentation for the main source code.

option.name: description
option.value: Does a maven install of the archives artifacts into the local .m2 cache.

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles a jar archive containing the main classes.

option.name: description
option.value: Generates Javadoc API documentation for the main source code.

option.name: description
option.value: Uses your files as and where they are and deploys them to Jetty.

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles the webapp into a war and deploys it to Jetty.

option.name: description
option.value: Stops Jetty.

option.name: description
option.value: Processes the main resources.

option.name: description
option.value: Processes the test resources.

option.name: description
option.value: Populates local H2 database with values from Demo reference tables (system data) ex: ./gradlew ref -D table=tradestatus

option.name: description
option.value: Runs the unit tests.

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles the test classes.

option.name: description
option.value: Uploads all artifacts belonging to configuration ':ih-db:archives'

option.name: description
option.value: Generates a war archive with all the compiled classes, the web-app content and the libraries.
